products.description: Inspired by the European style, the Cobb Hill Angelina shoes feature burnish leather construction that offers style and durability. The textile lining of these shoes keeps your feet comfy and breathable. These leather shoes come with an adjustable strap that provides you with a custom fit. Whether you're dressing up for an event or going for a casual outing, these low-heel shoes work for most occasions. Leather upper with a T-strap design. Contoured EVA footbed offers all-day comfort and support. Steel shank provides added stability. Block heel design. Low-top silhouette. Closed, round toe. Thermoplastic rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 1 1 2 in Weight: 1 lb Product measurements were taken using size 7, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.

products.description: EXCLUSIVE AT NET-A-PORTER. Alex Perry's 'Callan' midi dress is for the minimalist who gravitates toward simple silhouettes and clean lines. It's cut from smooth stretch-crepe for a close fit through the body and has an elegant strapless neckline.

products.name: FRAME - Double-breasted Crepe Blazer - Black
products.brandedName: Frame Double-breasted Crepe Blazer - Black
products.description: The brand is known for its impeccably cut denim so you can trust that FRAME's tailoring will be just as sharp. This longline crepe blazer has a double-breasted front with structured shoulders and a nipped-in waist. Match your jewelry to the gold-tone buttons.

products.name: Alex Perry - Strapless Sequined Crepe Midi Dress - Blue
products.brandedName: Alex Perry Strapless Sequined Crepe Midi Dress - Blue
products.unbrandedName: Strapless Sequined Crepe Midi Dress - Blue
products.description: EXCLUSIVE AT NET-A-PORTER. If you want to stun at your next event, Alex Perry's midi dress is a good place to start. Designed just for us, it's made from smooth crepe and saturated in shimmering sequins that reflect the light from every angle. It's cut for a figure-hugging fit and has a strapless neckline perfect for displaying a statement choker or a few strands of dainty necklaces.

products.name: Chocolate Floral August Bias Long Dress
products.brandedName: Zimmermann Chocolate Floral August Bias Long Dress
products.unbrandedName: Chocolate Floral August Bias Long Dress
products.description: One glance and you know that dress or bikini is Zimmermann. This iconic Australian Label stays true to its original vision: Sophisticated femininity, clever color combinations, and delicate original prints. Decorated in a print of vintage-inspired blooms, the Chocolate Floral August Long Dress is an effortlessly elegant warm-weather style. Made from luxe and airy linen, this maxi is cut on the bias for a slim fit and a flattering silhouette, then finished with a self-tie belt that allows you to cinch it to your desired shape. Pair this fabulously feminine frock with wedges and a clutch for a showstopping resort look perfect for a sunset boat cruise or dining under the stars. Round neckline Long sleeves Optional self-tie belt (included) Bias cut Maxi length Material: 100% Linen Care: Dry clean only

products.name: Yves Salomon Rex Rabbit Band Jacket in Blush
products.brandedName: Yves Salomon Rex Rabbit Band Jacket in Blush
products.unbrandedName: Rex Rabbit Band Jacket in Blush
products.description: Yves Salomon Rex Rabbit Band Jacket in Blush Self 1: 100% rabbit Lining: 100% goat Self 2: 100% silk. Fur Origin: China Made in France. Dry clean only. Front hook and bar closure. Side slant pockets. Soft fur fabric. YVES-WO125. 23WYV30355REXX. About the designer: Behind the company and the brand, there is a man and an artist inspired by the world of fur. Heir to a long line of furriers and a house built in the 1920s in Paris, founder and original designer, Gregory Salomon, worked diligently to create alluring fashion drawings and collections. With ancestral knowledge, consistent quality skins, and perfect control of all stages from creation to production in the workshops of the 10th arrondissement of Paris, Yves Salomon participates fully in the revival of fur that seduces fashionistas.

About the designer: Since its launch in 2016, the eponymous LPA label perfectly translates its elevated yet casual aesthetic into a cohesive vision. Epitomizing feminine Italian romance meets California tomboy, the ready-to-wear collection fashioned by Lara Pia Arrobio encapsulates the quintessential cool girl spirit with a raw, unapologetic attitude.

The Bogner FIRE + ICE Nessa-T Pant is an insulated and waterproof ski pant that has all the features we need to shred comfortably. Two zippered hand pockets hold our small essentials while the snow gaiters ensure we stay dry when we take a spill.
